ModMetaData.name: Mlies Misc Modifications
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
Various modifications I like when I play.
Support-chat: https://invite.gg/Mlie
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/MliesMiscModifications
Modifications:
Removes siege as allowed attack from all factions
Adds a Light-tab and movs vanilla lights to it
VanillaFences and ArchitectExpanded-Fences - Chainlink fence now requires Machining instead of smithing
TemperatureGauge - Both TemperatureGauges requires Basic Electronics
UN-Colony - Moves walls/doors to Structure-tab and floors to Floors-tab
UN-Furniture - Moves furniture to Furniture-tab, temp-stuff to Temperature-tab, addons to Misc-tab, and lights to Lights-tab
Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Moves lights to Lights-tab
More Furniture - Moves furniture to Vanilla Furniture Expanded-tab and lights to Lights tab
As Simple As a Rack - Moves racks to Extended Storage-tab
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Rs6T6cr.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
